topic.title: Decentralized Networks , Privacy enhancing and Anonymity
topic.body: Discussion about how private and protected is the network traffic, through services like Zeronet. How well privacy is maintained combined with the Onion Routing. Vulnerabilities , attacks on privacy and other Research questions. Any Ideas for searching?

3_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body: Arcane Maelstrom sounds good to me. I am very happy to listen to indie game developers. Hard work. Wish you best luck!

1_1HJnF1xNKtUDP33AtynJaH9UDmd8FTv27H.body: For example there is Riffle from MIT , still in develop. Any news from the research or anything?

A nice link i found that has a lot of services : 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JRzcmmm7X4iLsSLRDK7DT6EP2uPMnuLhP/

> [tkarita](#comment_113_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): Kaffie has a ZeroNet site search called Kaffiene.

Thank you tkarita , i have used Kaffiene, i also know the other search engines.

2_1BDTDgpyizvUDsc1hcL1pjCvXCy4ozzSFN.body:
This paper describes how the dc-nets enhance traffic resistance. I would like your opinion on Mix-nets through various papers i have found across. Riffle from MIT promises traffic resistance using mix-nets, shuffling the network traffic. 

Differences and drawbacks of each technology?Any news about this proposal , from 2013? 

I will also try to post something about this, when i read some more.
